description: Double car park of the Laguna Tollón Bird Observatory - Mirador la Mina. At the top we have a beautiful view but there is a very slight slope, and at the bottom there is a second flat parking lot. Both are gravelled and easily accessible. Depending on the direction of the wind you can hear the AP4 motorway a little but nothing disturbing. Please keep this place clean!

title: (11400) El Cuervo de Sevilla -

title: (41731) Marismillas - Calle Ferrocarril
title_short: (41731) Marismillas - Calle Ferrocarril
description: In Marismillas, large parking lot on the edge of the village overlooking the fields (made of cotton if we stop) Small village built in the square. Amazing. quiet place, some barking from dogs and crows from roosters, nothing very annoying. overnight stay prohibited

title: (41740) La Señuela -
title_short: (41740) La Señuela -
description: Very very quiet place to spend the day, there are motorhomes that spend the night, not emptying, not filling.

title: (41740) Lebrija - Carretera del Práctico
title_short: (41740) Lebrija - Carretera del Práctico
description: Top quality outdoor venue. Located on the border of the Donana National Park. Far from any town. Be careful, in the rain, the area turns into a mud desert. Access by a 10 kilometer dented track. Only for fully autonomous vehicles.

title: (41740) La Señuela - SE-9013
title_short: (41740) La Señuela - SE-9013
description: Vast picnic area on the banks of the Guadalquivir (Brazo del Medio) in the shade of large eucalyptus trees and in the company of many more or less shy storks. Easy access, from Lebrija, by a good track that crosses extensive areas of market gardening. Access from Palacios y Villafranca is not recommended for CCs, as the track is not in very good condition, bumpy in places... Take the opportunity to take a look at the hermitage of La Señuela, a few dozen meters from the area, on the other side of the track...

title: (41740) La Señuela -
title_short: (41740) La Señuela -
description:
Small lot by the river along an easily accessible track.
The place is very calm despite the few transport boats that sail on the river.
Very nice view at sunset and cohabitation with the swans (February)!

title: (41740) La Señuela -
title_short: (41740) La Señuela -
description:
Level course directly on the Guadalquivir with a great view of the river. Super quiet, only one ship a day.
Please be very quiet because the storks, which are everywhere here, are not as used to people as they are in Germany, for example. Please take more rubbish with you than you brought with you.

title: (41730) Las Cabezas de San Juan - 32 Calle Ávila
title_short: (41730) Las Cabezas de San Juan - 32 Calle Ávila
description: We spent one night in the parking lot. everything was fine. Again and again a few people on the road until after midnight, regularly individual cars, but everything was very peaceful. if you don't mind, it's an ideal place to stay for a night. Breakfast is served at DESAYONOS ANDRÉS.

title: (41730) Nuevo Rocío - Carr. del Práctico
title_short: (41730) Nuevo Rocío - Carr. del Práctico
description: Natural area next to the Guadalquivir river. Level terrain with some shadows. Frequented by fishermen. Access by dirt track but accessible to Ac.

title: (41730) Las Cabezas de San Juan - 103 Calle Enrique Granados
title_short: (41730) Las Cabezas de San Juan - 103 Calle Enrique Granados
description: We spent a quiet night here. The parking bay is on a slope, but at the highest point we stood pretty straight with two mobile homes. Ideal for children because there is a really great playground in the adjacent park. Likewise, a dog training area, where there are two water taps. We could watch the locals filling up water there to drink. In the village there is a super delicious pizzeria called "Pizzaburger Mario" Great value for money and super tasty.

title: (41730) Las Cabezas de San Juan - Autopista del Sur

title: (11407) Jerez de la Frontera - Km. 70 Autovía del Sur
title_short: (11407) Jerez de la Frontera - Km. 70 Autovía del Sur
description: Emptying and filling service at BP gas station. This is in the Cádiz-Seville direction. In the other direction there is another point with the same services. I guess we'll have BP to thank for that. I wish all gas stations had the same idea.

title: (41130) La Puebla del Río - Unnamed Road

title: (41728) Pinzón - 16 Calle la Rambla

Private area LA MORADA DEL SUR with all the services for motorhomes: repair shop, accessories store, rest room, snack machines, laundry, 24h video surveillance and personnel.
The price includes: electricity, water, gray water drainage and Wc, toilets with showers, Wi-Fi.
Bus right in front of the city center, restaurants and shops next door.

title: (11592) - 65 Lugar Ds
title_short: (11592)  - 65 Lugar Ds
description: This site is the general car park for Jerez Grand Prix circuit. It is massive and we spent a very quiet night here by ourselves. No noise, no disturbances at all. No amenities, just a flat piece of gravel and weeds car park.

It's along the highway, at night there is little traffic and enough trucks at night, that's for sure. The store has many typical products of the region. Thank you for the services.

title_short: (11407) Jerez de la Frontera - 1 Calle Velázquez

title: (11549) Sanlúcar de Barrameda -
title_short: (11549) Sanlúcar de Barrameda -
description: Bonanza, almost in the middle of the Doñana reserve, bordering the Guadalquivir. A place that is close to my heart. Beautiful landscape, flamingos. Watch out for the path, some ruts and holes. Do not borrow in November or wet periods. No height limit but just knowing how to read the path. Nobody to places. Silence, panorama, happiness. For nature lovers.

title: (11407) Jerez - 4 Calle Doctor Fleming
title_short: (11407) Jerez - 4 Calle Doctor Fleming

title_short: (11405) Jerez de la Frontera - 2 Calle Francisco Riba

title: (11405) Jerez de la Frontera - 1D Avenida de Arcos
title_short: (11405) Jerez de la Frontera - 1D Avenida de Arcos

title_short: (11407) Jerez de la Frontera - 8 Avenida Duque de Abrantes
description: Parking next to the MERCA 80 shopping center. Quiet and spacious. Sunny. Very close to the Equestrian Art School. The urban center 20 minutes on foot. Supermarket, bakery, Asian bazaar, hardware store, hairdresser, optician, etc ... Places for breakfast and tapas. Brewery, Italian restaurant, kebab. Gas station, sale of butane and possibility of filling with water. Empty ask Very busy from Monday to Friday from 9.30 am by the Tax Office and courts. It is free again from 2.30pm. THURSDAY partially prohibited by the market from 7 to 15 hours.

title: (11407) Jerez de la Frontera - Calle Antonio Machado
title_short: (11407) Jerez de la Frontera - Calle Antonio Machado
description: Quiet street in front of a park. We spent the night and without problems. 15 min from the center of Jerez. There is a nearby bar for breakfast.

title_short: (11405) Jerez de la Frontera - 11C Calle Miguel de Unamuno
description: Quiet parking. Very spacious. 800 meters from the center. without services. Near a gas station with a self-service washing machine, and a Mercadona, opposite a hospital.

title_short: (11405) Jerez de la Frontera - 21 Avenida Lola Flores

Percentroot. There is a merchandise and a Carrefour and also the football stadium chapín, where the Xerez sports sport FIS. In the cafeteria Alfredo Café Cupas you have free WiFi.

title_short: (11405) Jerez de la Frontera - 2 Avenida Chema Rodriguez

title_short: (11620) Jédula - 13 Calle Beatriz Cáceres Castillo

title_short: (11406) Jerez de la Frontera - 20 Calle Guadalmedina

title_short: (11593) Jerez de la Frontera - Carretera Cortes

The access to the place is very easy to drive. Unfortunately, the street is very close and very busy. There were slight noises (discotheque?) to hear.

title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 35C Calle Taxdirt

title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - Rda. Aurora Boreal

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 9 Camino Arroyo de la Puya
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 9 Camino Arroyo de la Puya
description: Parking to go to the beach in Bonanza, Sanlucar de Barrameda.  There is a SHELL petrol station nearby and a bakery up the road as well as restaurants.  There is the old Castillo that’s nice to visit as well (often covered with teenagers and cats though).  Beautiful spot. There can be a lot of rubbish left but hoping if more tourists come it’s an incentive for the local government (ayuntamiento de Sanlucar) to clean up the place !

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 14 Calle Calzada del Arroyo
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 14 Calle Calzada del Arroyo
description: Parking in the street, next to the founding vineyard. It is very central, the cathedral to 750 m. We stop only to visit.

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 2 Calle de Muleros
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 2 Calle de Muleros
description: Unpaved parking, very close to the center, and quiet. We slept there a couple of nights at Christmas and it was great. no problem.

title: (11406) Jerez de la Frontera - 8 Calle Federico Chueca
title_short: (11406) Jerez de la Frontera - 8 Calle Federico Chueca
description: Very calm and tree-lined dead end, small park where people come to walk their dogs at the end of the dead end. I spent one night there with no problem.

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 1Z Avenida de Rota
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 1Z Avenida de Rota

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 2 Calle Marcelo Villalobos
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 2 Calle Marcelo Villalobos
description:
15 minutes from the old center. In a residential area in absolute calm.
Perfect and quieter than around the nearby park. Ideal van.

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 33 Calle Historiador Bartolomé Gutiérrez
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 33 Calle Historiador Bartolomé Gutiérrez
description: We tried all the places near Tio Pepe winery on Friday morning (around 10am) and it was impossible to find a spot. Here we are 1km far from the entrance (and also from the historic center) and there is plenty of space for more campers. Green area, calm place (besides being on the street), flat, cyclopath near. We don’t know if it’s safe, but we didn’t see any danger.

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - Calle Orfebre Alonso Moreno
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - Calle Orfebre Alonso Moreno
description: Large parking near department stores and a MacDo. Perfect to reach on foot (10 mn) the sites to visit. No security problem, store space and parking under surveillance! Bins all sort! Used by day, but can also be used at night (see truck (s) ...)

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - C. José Manuel García Caparros
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - C. José Manuel García Caparros
description: Parking next to the Pedro S. Garrido stadium in Jerez de la Frontera, we spent a night with a little noise until 10pm. but at night it is very quiet BE CAREFUL ON MONDAYS IT IS THE MARKET and you cannot park.

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 641 N-IV
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 641 N-IV
description: Carrefour shopping center. drinking water at the service station next to the vacuum cleaner. The hose is suitable for filling! Excellent! Thank you Carrefour!

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - Calle Juana Aguilar Pazos
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - Calle Juana Aguilar Pazos
description: Good place day and night

title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 38 Calle Arquitecto Hernández Rubio
description: Parking with a 7,5t at the calle Arquitecto Hernández Rubio (minimum traffic here, but beware of the mini catolic church - here is little noisy people going inside and outside), but this place is very good and we sleep here with no problem, park is full of dog-walkers, near (1km) is the bigger shops and centrum is about 15 minutes of walk.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 38D Avenida Bajo de Guía
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 38D Avenida Bajo de Guía

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 34 Avenida Bajo de Guía
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 34 Avenida Bajo de Guía

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 19 Avenida de la Constitucion
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 19 Avenida de la Constitucion

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 25D Avenida de Italia
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 25D Avenida de Italia

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 9998 Calle Escritor William Shakespeare
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 9998 Calle Escritor William Shakespeare

title: (41719) El Palmar de Troya - SE-9015
title_short: (41719) El Palmar de Troya - SE-9015

title: (41719) Utrera - 7 SE-9015

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 163 Avenida Quinto Centenario
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 163 Avenida Quinto Centenario
description: El Sur automatic laundry, recently installed, 3 washing machines and 4 dryers with possibility of increasing the time. washing includes detergent, fabric softener and active oxygen. very satisfied! no wifi. possible to park nearby (wide avenues). automatic coin change

title: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 76 Avenida de Cádiz
title_short: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 76 Avenida de Cádiz
description: Quiet parking for the night. Next to Dia supermarket, burger King and other stores. Gas station near and across the road Municipal public swimming pool and sports center. Easy access. And well connected to the Cádiz highway.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 41 Avenida de las Piletas
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 41 Avenida de las Piletas
description: Esplanade controlled by "gorrillas" and very quiet. Five minutes from the historic center.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 6 Calle Barrón
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 6 Calle Barrón
description: Washer and dryer with 8 and 18kg next to the main entrance of the Dia Maxi. There are enough parking spaces there except Wednesday because there is a very large weekly market next door.

title: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 41 Calle Rayo
title_short: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 41 Calle Rayo
description:
Parking de tierra tranquilo para pasar la noche al lado del Mercadona.
Los baños del supermercado son accesibles durante los horarios de apertura.
Sin servicios

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 1 Calle Lucero del Alba
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 1 Calle Lucero del Alba

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 2 Calle República Dominicana
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 2 Calle República Dominicana
description: Gray and black water discharge services and drinking water to load, central area but easily accessible dinoverde car washes

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 4 Calle Ramón Vázquez Orellana
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 4 Calle Ramón Vázquez Orellana
description: This small laundry is the only place in Arcos de la Frontera where you can have your clothes washed. The laundry is labeled "dry cleaning", but they also offer a normal laundry service. The next day we were able to pick up our freshly washed and folded clothes from the friendly señora. It is really recommended!

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 4 Calle Antonio y Carlos Murciano
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 4 Calle Antonio y Carlos Murciano
description: Unpaved parking in front of the Bus Station. Passable road with large AC. Near other car parks visible on P4N. No problem to stay overnight, quiet area. We are in mid-November 2022. In twenty minutes on foot you can reach the historic center, full of history. Recommended.

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - Av. Duque de Arcos
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - Av. Duque de Arcos
description: Large dirt parking without service. Ideal for visiting the beautiful village of Arcos de la Frontera. We did not spend the night, but it seems that the night parking is tolerated on this car park (according to other motorhomes).

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 19 Carretera de Chipiona
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 19 Carretera de Chipiona
description: Gas station with filling and emptying of gray water and soon sewage, supermarket and spare parts store, parking with surveillance cameras with possibility to spend the day or leave the motorhome long stay. Pressure wash adapted to the large vehicle scale as our motorhome.

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera -
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera -
description: Incredible views towards the Peña de Arcos, perfect place to park, motorhomes, etc. Very spacious, on both sides of the river.

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - Los Cabezuelos
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - Los Cabezuelos
description: By the river (swimming possible) and very quiet. Little shade and a lot of rubbish unfortunately but perfect for the night. A herd of cow comes on the ground at sunset but does not stay long. Also suitable for large motorhomes but flat terrain limited to 3-4

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera -
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera -
description: Before the other area with several reviews, directly opposite the farm by the river. We preferred to stay here as access was easier and the other area was full with 3 vans already. The area I can be quite busy during the day with families visiting.

title: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 103 Avenida de Sevilla
title_short: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 103 Avenida de Sevilla
description: Standard self-service laundromat at Dia's supermarket parking spot

title: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 1 Avenida Parque Norte
title_short: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 1 Avenida Parque Norte
description: Tap for drinkable water in park, can be used to fill up containers as it twists. Enter via a door opposite the Shell garage.

title: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 111 Avenida de Sevilla
title_short: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 111 Avenida de Sevilla
description: Parking reserved from traffic, next to a park, restaurants, shops, supermarket, ... a lot of traffic noise but not excessive

title: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - Av. de Utrera S/N
title_short: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - Av. de Utrera S/N
description: BP LOS PALACIOS introduces a new service for motorhomes. In our facilities we have places for the disposal of black water and water supply for our customers. We also have ample parking for all types of vehicles, with 24-hour fuel service, washing area and vacuum cleaner for cars and trucks. Our location is ideal for taking the motorway exits to Seville, Huelva or Cadiz, as we have cafes and supermarkets near the station. OPENING HOURS: Monday to Friday: 6:00 a.m. - 10:30 p.m. Saturday and Sunday: 7:00 a.m. - 10:30 p.m.

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - Unnamed Road
description: Just the side of a lane with walkers and a few cars. Enough for small van. But great views of the cliffs at night. And amazing number of egrets in the trees on the little island. Probably over 100 roosting overnight.

title: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 43 Calle Macarena
title_short: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - 43 Calle Macarena
description: Public parking. You can spend the night quietly, little noise, a large esplanade where you can do maneuvers. At 8 in the morning there is more influx because there is a clinic nearby.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 375 Carretera de la Jara
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 375 Carretera de la Jara
description: Mixed parking along the park road overlooking the sea Not recommended for motorhomes with trailers or heavy goods vehicles No service

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 11 Calle Playa de Zahara
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - 11 Calle Playa de Zahara

title: (11638) El Santiscal - 701 Avenida Príncipe de España
title_short: (11638) El Santiscal - 701 Avenida Príncipe de España
description: Quiet area, you can swim, artificial beach on the lake with spectacular views, with tables, WC, bar-restaurant. You cannot camp but you can spend the night, there is a campsite nearby.

title: (11638) El Santiscal - 701 Avenida Príncipe de España
title_short: (11638) El Santiscal - 701 Avenida Príncipe de España
description: Free water tap at the beach. Quier if you come in the morning or at night. Cold shower also available.

title: (11638) El Santiscal - 5 Calle Pintor Francisco Bayeu
title_short: (11638) El Santiscal - 5 Calle Pintor Francisco Bayeu
description: Quiet parking at the end of a dead end at the lake. Very quiet, and without the traffic of the other 2 spots nearby ... In the middle of palm trees!

title: (11638) El Santiscal - 185 Avenida Sombrero de Tres Picos
title_short: (11638) El Santiscal - 185 Avenida Sombrero de Tres Picos

title: (11638) El Santiscal - 6 Calle Pintor Goya
title_short: (11638) El Santiscal - 6 Calle Pintor Goya
description: Small quiet parking with lake view. Close to other small car parks, without services. To date, no overnight accommodation problems.

title: (11638) El Santiscal - 59 Avenida del Santiscal
title_short: (11638) El Santiscal - 59 Avenida del Santiscal
description: Small parking lot at the end of a dead end street.  Calm and pleasant.

title: (11638) El Santiscal - 8 Avenida Príncipe de España
title_short: (11638) El Santiscal - 8 Avenida Príncipe de España
description: Near the leisure and catering base, on line parking by the lake in a dead end. No prohibition sign.

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera -
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera -
description: Quiet place in a pine forest, to rest for a while or even spend the night. Only the cars on the road can be heard a little.

title: (11640) Bornos - 58 Calle Puerto
title_short: (11640) Bornos - 58 Calle Puerto
description: Quiet place in the urban area where you can park to visit the town or rest from the trip. There is no service of any kind, only garbage containers. Together Public school.

title: (11640) Bornos - 1 Plaza las Monjas
title_short: (11640) Bornos - 1 Plaza las Monjas
description: Ample place to park up to AC of 7 meters. Next to a square with a playground for children and a bar with a terrace. To spend the day I think nobody would tell you anything to park.

name: Camping Lago de Arcos
title: (11630) Camping Lago de Arcos
title_short: (11630) Camping Lago de Arcos
description: Located in Arcos de la Frontera, Cádiz. Accessible and comfortable, close to the town, to all kinds of attractions and tourist attractions adapted to all tastes and ages. From a quiet walk to an afternoon of nautical activities on the lake, eating typical products or a hiking route. We offer offers in low season.

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 33 Calle Peña
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 33 Calle Peña
description: Parking place to spend the night with incredible views of the Castle. quiet and no traffic

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 10-22 Calle Salida del Puente
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - 10-22 Calle Salida del Puente
description: Parking with great views of Arcos de la Frontera. Without any service. Possible night off season. It can be complicated to turn around for long motorhomes.

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - C-344
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - C-344
description: Private area of payment guarded and with perimeter fence, gate closed at night, paved, with water and electricity service. Good views of the town qda about 15 minutes by bike. Restaurant in the same area, good prices. Arches of the border. Very tourist town, castle, medieval churches and narrow alleys.  Call if the door is closed

title: (11640) Bornos -
title_short: (11640) Bornos -
description: In height in front of the lake exceptional sunrise for vehicles of 6m max to be able to turn around in the path not far from the city but in a quiet area beautiful walk to do on foot or mountain bike beware of the end of glass (Spain...)

title: (11640) Bornos - 37 Avenida de la Diputación
title_short: (11640) Bornos - 37 Avenida de la Diputación
description: A nice place not very big, but people very friendly, forbidden to stay. You can swim in the lake.

name: Camper Park Sanlúcar
title: (11540) Camper Park Sanlúcar
title_short: (11540) Camper Park Sanlúcar
description: The motorhome area looks great with all services available, electricity on all pitches. Very spacious pitches of 60 m² and flat ground, each pitch has a piece of artificial grass. family atmosphere.

title: (41150) Poblado de Alfonso XIII - La Puebla del Río
title_short: (41150) Poblado de Alfonso XIII - La Puebla del Río
description: Parking very close to the lagoon frequented by flamingos

title: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - C-334
title_short: (11630) Arcos de la Frontera - C-334
description: A recreational area without services but perfect to rest and walk with a view of the town of arches of the border, many pines and very shady, it is not forbidden to stay overnight as there is no sign that prohibits it. next gas stations services.

title: (11640) Bornos - 37 Avenida de la Diputación
title_short: (11640) Bornos - 37 Avenida de la Diputación
description: Free parking in front of the camping place. Flat and clean. Very bright during the night. Walking distance from the city. Much cleaner than the place next to this. Might be full in the summer though. Also toilets next to the place, but they are closed right now.

name: CAT Lake Bornos
title: (11640) CAT Lake Bornos
title_short: (11640) CAT Lake Bornos
description:
ALWAYS CALL BEFOREHAND SINCE AIR SPORTS EVENTS MAY BE TAKING PLACE AT THE TIME YOU WANT TO STAY THERE ...

 Excellent & Tranquil Campsite on the shores of Lake Bornos, with spectacular views of the lake & distant mountains, and an amazing sunrise . Owner Francisco is really helpful & friendly. Starting point of walks, hikes , motorbike & cycling, kayaking from here, very good restaurants around the village of Bornos , Dia supermarket & gas stations. Special place to be for flying enthusiasts , ideal for paramotoring & powered trike flying, the campsite caters also as a powered paragliding school. Takeoff and landing spots just minutes away from campsite. Highly recommend if in the area or nearby...important to enter the road from Hermegas Bornos ( see attached pic) , ONLY easily accessible for motorhomes from that direction !

title: (41719) Utrera - 49 Urbanizacion la Cañada
title_short: (41719) Utrera - 49 Urbanizacion la Cañada
description: At the foot of the torre de l'Aguila. The climb is difficult (reserved for 4x4 or intrepid van) but the view absolutely splendid. Upstairs there is a small bench where you can spend the night. Below the lake there is another place where you can go if there is too much wind at the top.

title: (11640) Bornos - 56 Calle Río Guadalete
title_short: (11640) Bornos - 56 Calle Río Guadalete
description: drinking fountain

title: (41710) Utrera - Unnamed Road
title_short: (41710) Utrera - Unnamed Road
description: Related to the neighboring spot. Just to show that there is really a lot of space here. LTE partially available.

name: Parking La Dehesa de Abajo
title: (41130) Parking La Dehesa de Abajo
title_short: (41130) Parking La Dehesa de Abajo
description: In the front park of Doñana, a nice place to walk and enjoy the landscape. Ample parking, easy access. Attention, only allowed during the day.

title: (11640) Bornos -
title_short: (11640) Bornos -
description: In front of the lake possibility of putting it in the shade sloping ground but you can dig easily and put calles not far from the city but it is very quiet (done with a van. to be tested for cc)

title: (41710) Utrera - Unnamed Road
title_short: (41710) Utrera - Unnamed Road
description: Place in the middle of nature facing the lake, do not hesitate to walk along the paths, several spots, picnic table. No regulatory height and flat land 1 hour from Seville.

title: (11640) Bornos - 51 Extrarradio Diseminados
title_short: (11640) Bornos - 51 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: The landscape is very beautiful - very narrow and sometimes poor access.

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda -
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda -
description: Place in the middle of nature. near a quiet road. No services. for two vans or a motorhome. little to offer but tranquility for the night. what is difficult in the region

title: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - s/n Camino de la Reyerta
title_short: (11540) Sanlúcar de Barrameda - s/n Camino de la Reyerta
description: Private parking area and services, with large plots (100m2) of grass and located 50m from the beach, area of tourist interest. Drainage and drinking water services are included in the price. Electricity is extra. Easy access by bus to the city center. Very close to the cycle path "via verde entre rios" towards Chipiona (4 km) and Rota (16 km). We arrive in front of a generally closed gate. A sign badly translated into French invites you to open the gate, to close it and to advance to the reception located in the middle of the area. Payment in cash only, at the end of the stay.

title: (11640) Bornos -
title_short: (11640) Bornos -
description: Lake spot by Bornos about 50 min Granada. Town 500m away with cafe etc and a beautiful free walked garden and town WiFi. Flat, lake and mountain view, walking around lake

title: (11640) Bornos - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11640) Bornos - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place with a view!!! Definitely worth it!!

title: (41719) El Palmar de Troya -
title_short: (41719) El Palmar de Troya -
description:
Following a rocky road you arrive at a flat space next to the lake. The location is surrounded by trees and wild growth. Great camping spot.
I came with a small van, would not recommend it for motorhomes, the other side of the lake has more accessible spots though.
A few children came by in the evening (saturday) but otherwise very few human sounds

title: (11620) Arcos de la Frontera - A-389
title_short: (11620) Arcos de la Frontera - A-389
description: Filler neck for cooling water

title: (41710) Utrera -
title_short: (41710) Utrera -
description: New Cañada Real area in a 60,000m2 olive grove estate in the heart of the Sevillian countryside for your enjoyment with all the services: Toilets, sinks, service area, washer and dryer, video surveillance, daily bread on request, equestrian activities on demand, gas station on demand. 300 meters etc. We have 18 plots of approx. 80 m2 with electricity and 20 plots of approx. 50 m2 without electricity among the olive trees, designed for your rest and relaxation, without narrowness or stress, to enjoy nature and forget about the world.

title: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 10 Carretera Ds
title_short: (11408) Jerez de la Frontera - 10 Carretera Ds
description: Two small parking spaces near the lagoon of the Medina. Just off the road, there is a sound barrier to protect the lagoon that leads to a beautiful hiking trail.

title: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - Autopista del Sur
title_short: (41720) Los Palacios y Villafranca - Autopista del Sur
description: Gas station parking. Near the highway but nothing is heard. Flat parking.

title: (41700) Sevilla - Hacienda Los Cabreros Carretera SE-9024, Km 6,5
title_short: (41700) Sevilla - Hacienda Los Cabreros Carretera SE-9024, Km 6,5
description: La Jabega motorhome area, the area is open. An area for a motorhome with access to electricity, loading and unloading of gray / black water, showers and Wi-Fi. Unlimited time. Even if the door is closed ring the bell.

address.street: Hacienda Los Cabreros Carretera SE-9024, Km 6,5

title: (11550) - 9021 Camino Pista Montijo
title_short: (11550)  - 9021 Camino Pista Montijo
description: Parking access for the beach bar that there is and the 4 neighbors. Zone level ( /-) Cuttlefish and pickled dogfish… brutal??. Very quiet area and with a brutal sunset!

name: La Siesta de la Gaviota
title: (11550) La Siesta de la Gaviota
title_short: (11550) La Siesta de la Gaviota
description: Service area for motorhomes. Caravans are not allowed. The night area of LSG occupies an area of 6 hectares. All the plots are perfectly flat and have electricity (optional) and water. All our pitches are between 100m² and 200m2 and most are grassed and separated by hedges. Our plots are built around a large roundabout and the common areas are in the center so they are close to everyone. We also have a sports, health and wellness center, UBUNTU, where you can book functional rehabilitation sessions, yoga, Pilates, personal training, nutrition, chiropractic, etc. LONG STAY DISCOUNTS: 15% discount for all stays of more than 30 nights

title: (41150) Poblado de Alfonso XIII - Unnamed Road
title_short: (41150) Poblado de Alfonso XIII - Unnamed Road
description: Calm and quiet place surrounded by pine forests, near a nucleus of houses and restaurants. Good coverage, no services.

title: (11570) Jerez de la Frontera - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11570) Jerez de la Frontera - Unnamed Road
description: La Suara recreation area, barbecues, quiet site, you can spend the night very quiet, ideal for walking or cycling.

title: (11550) Chipiona - 54 Lugar Pago Copina
title_short: (11550) Chipiona - 54 Lugar Pago Copina
description: Camping: Niño de Oro between Chipiona and Sanlúcar on the Via Verde (cycle path along the old railway line) the area is called Playa Banane. Showers, toilets, hot water, electricity, Wifi etc. Dogs allowed on a leash and free of charge

title: (11649) Coto de Bornos -
title_short: (11649) Coto de Bornos -
description: A tranquil semi flat plot on the banks of the Bornos lake accessible for campervan a who don’t mind veering off tarmacked roads and into nature. The lake may be full or, like in March 2023, looking rather empty. Otherwise a great place for kayaking or even swimming but you may have to walk to get to the waters edge if low water levels.  Very green in spring be ready to be ambushed by horses and cows . The view when you wake up is stunningly baby blue and green .  So, although this is not a camp site as such, there are no signs prohibiting camping or doing overnight stays. We have done so a few times and seems like this is tolerated……

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - Km 653 N-4
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - Km 653 N-4

title: (11550) Chipiona - 6 Calle la Cuba
title_short: (11550) Chipiona - 6 Calle la Cuba
description: Parking shaded by some trees. Public toilets next door (hours from 11 a.m. to 9 p.m.), a beach bar that offers very good food to take away, showers on the beach and footbaths on the sidewalk (open 24 hours)

name: Puerto de Chipiona
title: (11550) Puerto de Chipiona
title_short: (11550) Puerto de Chipiona
description: Chipiona Marina authorized by the Junta de Andalucía. 10m length limit. Excellent, adequate camper place with views and access to the beach. The access code to both the door to the beach and the services is on the receipt. Access through a barrier by parking your vehicle in front of it (about 1m away). If there are several motorhomes, a minimum distance of 3 meters must be maintained when driving in and the barrier must be lowered before you are positioned in front of it. If there are free spaces, the barrier opens automatically with the registration data and entry time. To request your stay in the region, you must enter the first two digits of your license plate and choose your license plate from those offered by the system. You must select one of the places offered by the system as free (green), indicate the days you want to stay and pay with your card. There are 10 power columns each with 4 connections power connections. Water service and black and gray water drainage is included in the price. Free showers as well as all port services.

address.street: Puerto Deportivo s/n, Av. de Rocío Jurado

title: (11550) Chipiona - 34 Calle Ana Pomar
title_short: (11550) Chipiona - 34 Calle Ana Pomar
description: Free drinking water at petrol station. Just ask in the shop and they will give you the key to turn the tap on.

title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 305 Calle Pítágoras

title: (11550) Arriates - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11550) Arriates - Unnamed Road
description: Area recreativa Pinar De La Villa. i didn't see any sign of no camping or no parking overnight, i spent 2 night there in July with noone even on a Sunday afternoon, it's also look very clean compared to other recreational area in Spain, just some dog barking. there is a water tap, rubbish bin around and picnic tables, you can park near the table and there is plenty of space and shade. LEAVE NO TRACE!

title: (41849) Aznalcázar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (41849) Aznalcázar - Unnamed Road
description: Large recreational area, along the A3114 and the unpaved side roads to the west towards Villamanrique de la Condesa. Multiple parking places with shade from trees. For walking, cycling and overnight. Some parking places are very remote. The two (?) Side roads are less suitable for campers with little ground clearance. No open fire from 1 June to 15 October.
